00041 #ifndef _xmlattribute_h
00042 #define _xmlattribute_h
00043 
00044 #include "xmlbase.h"
00045 
00046 namespace ticpp
00047 {
00048     class Attribute;
00049 }
00050 
00051 namespace phys
00052 {
00053     namespace xml
00054     {
00055         /// @class Attribute
00056         /// @brief This represents the attributes that could exist on an XML element
00057         /// @file xmlattribute.h
00058         /// @details This wraps ticpp::Attribute tighlty to help make the interface cleaner and easier to use
00059         class Attribute : public Base
00060         {
00061             protected:
00062                 /// @brief Construct an attribute using meta data from a TiCPP pointer
00063                 Attribute (ticpp::Attribute* Meta);
00064 
00065             public:
00066 
00067                 /// @brief Construct an empty attribute.
00068                 Attribute ();
00069 
00070                 /// @brief Tears down an attribute and removes the node from the DOM
00071                 ~Attribute ();
00072 
00073                 /// @brief Construct an attribute with name and value.
00074                 /// @param name What the Attribute is called for example in " <div style="14">Content</div> " the word "style" is the attribute name
00075                 /// @param value What the Attribute is called for example in " <div style="14">Content</div> " the word "14" is the attribute value
00076                 Attribute (const String &name, const String &value);
00077 
00078                 /// @brief Get the value of this attribute.
00079                 /// @return this returns a String containing the value of this attribute.
00080                 String GetValue() const;
00081 
00082                 /// @brief Set the value of this node.
00083                 /// @param value A Whole number to be inserted into the XML document
00084                 void SetValue(const Whole &value);
00085                 /// @brief Set the value of this node.
00086                 /// @param value A Real number to be inserted into the XML document
00087                 void SetValue(const Real &value);
00088                 /// @brief Set the value of this node.
00089                 /// @param value A String number to be inserted into the XML document
00090                 void SetValue(const String &value);
00091 
00092                 /// @brief Set the Name of this attribute.
00093                 /// @param name A String that is the name the attribute will have.
00094                 void SetName(const String &Name);
00095 
00096                 /// @brief Get the Name of this attribute.
00097                 /// @return This returns a String containing the name
00098                 String GetName() const;
00099 
00100                 /// @brief Get the next sibling attribute in the DOM.
00101                 /// @warning This will cause memory leaks if the created pointer is not deleted
00102                 /// @param throwIfNo Attribute Should this function throw an exception if it fails, or silently fail. Defaults to true so it throws errors on failure.
00103                 /// @return Returns a pointer to an XML::Attribute that comes after this one, but still on the same element
00104                 Attribute* Next(bool throwIfNoAttribute=true) const;
00105 
00106                 /// @brief Get the Previous sibling attribute in the DOM.
00107                 /// @warning This will cause memory leaks if the created pointer is not deleted
00108                 /// @param throwIfNo Attribute Should this function throw an exception if it fails, or silently fail. Defaults to true so it throws errors on failure.
00109                 /// @return Returns a pointer to an XML::Attribute that comes before this one, but still on the same element.
00110                 Attribute* Previous (bool throwIfNoAttribute=true) const;
00111 
00112                 /// @brief This identifies what kind of child of xml::base this is
00113                 /// @return This returns Base::isAttribute
00114                 virtual XMLComponentType GetType();
00115             /*
00116                 //All TinyXml classes can print themselves to a filestream.
00117                 //virtual void  Print (FILE *file, int depth) const
00118             */
00119 
00120         };
00121     }
00122 }
00123 
00124 #endif
